pr_title: Allow gdb path based on image name.

timeline.message: Allow gdb path based on image name.

timeline.bodyText: currentDockerImage is not guaranteed to be set (f.ex. if core is dumped while starting or stopping the container), I suggest defaulting to the RHEL 7 variant.
timeline.author: freva

timeline.bodyText: I suggest using context.pathInNodeUnderVespaHome() and remove the option from constructor
timeline.author: freva

timeline.message: Use context to get Vespa home.
Image name is part of the repository.
